text:
I'm pretty new to the developer community, special thanks to <@U25PYL3Q8> and <@UD53A9UUR> for making me feel welcome.

Thank you <@U8THBCFC4> for jumping in to help on an unexpected issue when I wasn't sure where to turn!

<@U2H3TT8F2> and <@UKHNRHVC7> have been amazing in getting answers on two major issues and I really appreciate your continued communication and support. Thank you both for all you do to support the developer community!
